title: Good Omens Amazon Prime Review
author: Austin Burke
comment: Sheen and Tennant are both phenomenal in this 👏🏻

As a huge fan of Good Omens, Gaiman, and Tenant (particularly from his Doctor Who days), I was really excited about the series. I was a little worried it wouldn't be able meet my expectations (the book's my favorite). I was floored.

Good Omens is one of my favorite books. The biggest difference is the end. It tied up loose ends that the book did not.

The narration, I think, was the only way to keep some of Pratchett’s narration and voice.
The series is based on a book by two legendary authors and the series so far has been very lovingly faithful to the book
I'm not anticipating Good Omens, but I'm always anticipating anything which involves David Tenant
description:
Good Omens hit Amazon Prime and today, I give you my thoughts on the entire season!

Did you all enjoy Good Omens? Let me know!
Hit that thumbs up button if you enjoyed this Prime Review!
